comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
I wonder if it is Lerdo Avenue in Ciudad Juárez or Ciudad Lerdo, State of Durango, Comarca Lagunera (Laguna District).  The serial nr. 3069-4 locates the photo after april 1914. And if photo 3069-7 says: "Torreón, federals going to battle" it seems likely that Lerdo reffers to one of the three main cities of the Laguna district (Torreón [in Coahuila State, south to Nazas River], Gómez Palacio and Lerdo [in Durango State at the northern edge of Nazas River])
Dr. Roberto Duarte

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
Assault to Lerdo took place on March 23-24, 1914,  by the brigade commanded by Maclovio Herrera. from the city south-west, as part of what is known as "La Batalla de Torreón" .  Then, may  this photo be corraled in those days? Are this men Maclovio Herrera's soldiers?
Dr. Roberto Duarte
